emojies_animated_zoom.description: /** * Animated * emojis and * animated * dice should be scaled by this factor before being shown * to the user (float) */

keep_alive_service.description:
/**
 * Whether app clients should start a keepalive service to keep
 * the app running and fetch updates even when the app is
 * closed (boolean)
 */

background_connection.description:
/**
 * Whether app clients should start a background TCP connection
 * for MTProto update fetching (boolean)
 */

emojies_send_dice.description: /** * A list of supported * animated * dice stickers (array of strings). */

emojies_send_dice_success.description: /** * For * animated * dice emojis other than the basic , indicates the winning dice value and * the final frame of the animated sticker, at which to show * the fireworks (object with emoji keys and object * values, containing value and * frame_start float values) */

emojies_sounds.description: /** * A map of soundbites to be played when the user clicks on the * specified * animated * emoji; the * file * reference field should be base64-decoded before * downloading * the file (map of * file * IDs ({@link RawInputDocument}.id), with emoji string * keys) */

gif_search_branding.description: /** * Specifies the name of the service providing GIF search * through * gif_search_username * (string) */

gif_search_emojies.description:
/**
 * Specifies a list of emojis that should be suggested as
 * search term in a bar above the GIF search box (array of
 * string emojis)
 */

stickers_emoji_suggest_only_api.description: /** * Specifies that the app should not display * local * sticker suggestions Â» for emojis at all and just use the * result of {@link messages.RawGetStickersRequest} (bool) */

stickers_emoji_cache_time.description: /** * Specifies the validity period of the local cache of * {@link messages.RawGetStickersRequest}, also relevant when * generating the * pagination * hash when invoking the method. (integer) */

qr_login_camera.description: /** * Whether the Settings->Devices menu should show an option * to scan a * QR * login code (boolean) */

qr_login_code.description: /** * Whether the login screen should show a * QR code * login option, possibly as default login method (string, * "disabled", "primary" or "secondary") */

dialog_filters_enabled.description: /** * Whether clients should show an option for managing * dialog * filters AKA folders (boolean) */

dialog_filters_tooltip.description: /** * Whether clients should actively show a tooltip, inviting the * user to configure * dialog * filters AKA folders; typically this happens when the * chat list is long enough to start getting cluttered. * (boolean) */

autoarchive_setting_available.description: /** * Whether clients can invoke * {@link account.RawSetGlobalPrivacySettingsRequest} with * {@link RawGlobalPrivacySettings}, to automatically archive * and mute new incoming chats from non-contacts. (boolean) */

pending_suggestions.description: /** * Contains a list of suggestions that should be actively shown * as a tooltip to the user. (Array of strings, possible values * shown in the suggestions section * Â». */

topics_pinned_limit.description: /** * Maximum number of * topics * that can be pinned in a single * forum. * (integer) */

telegram_antispam_user_id.description: /** * The ID of the official * native * antispam bot, that will automatically delete spam * messages if enabled as specified in the * native * antispam documentation Â». * * * When fetching the admin list of a supergroup using * {@link channels.RawGetParticipantsRequest}, if native * antispam functionality in the specified supergroup, the bot * should be manually added to the admin list displayed to the * user. (numeric string that represents a Telegram user/bot * ID, should be casted to an int64) */

telegram_antispam_group_size_min.description: /** * Minimum number of group members required to enable * native * antispam functionality. (integer) */

fragment_prefixes.description: /** * List of phone number prefixes for anonymous * Fragment phone numbers. * (array of strings). */

hidden_members_group_size_min.description:
/**
 * Minimum number of participants required to hide the
 * participants list of a supergroup using
 * {@link channels.RawToggleParticipantsHiddenRequest}.
 * (integer)
 */

url_auth_domains.description: /** * A list of domains that support automatic login with manual * user confirmation, * click * here for more info on URL authorization Â». (array of * strings) */

autologin_domains.description: /** * A list of Telegram domains that support automatic login with * no user confirmation, * click * here for more info on URL authorization Â». (array of * strings) */

whitelisted_domains.description: /** * A list of Telegram domains that can always be opened without * additional user confirmation, when clicking on in-app links * where the URL is not fully displayed (i.e. * {@link RawMessageEntityTextUrl} entities). (array of * strings)Note that when opening * named * Mini App links for the first time, confirmation should * still be requested from the user, even if the domain of the * containing deep link is whitelisted (i.e. * t.me/<bot_username>/<short_name>?startapp=<start_parameter>, * where t.me is whitelisted). Confirmation * should always be asked, even if we already * opened the * named * Mini App before, if the link is not visible (i.e. * {@link RawMessageEntityTextUrl} text links, inline buttons * etc.). */

round_video_encoding.description:
/**
 * Contains a set of recommended codec parameters for round
 * videos.  (object, as described in the example)
 */

chat_read_mark_size_threshold.description: /** * Per-user read receipts, fetchable using * {@link messages.RawGetMessageReadParticipantsRequest}, will * be available in groups with an amount of participants less * or equal to chat_read_mark_size_threshold. * (integer) */

chat_read_mark_expire_period.description: /** * To protect user privacy, read receipts for chats are only * stored for chat_read_mark_expire_period seconds * after the message was sent. (integer) */

pm_read_date_expire_period.description: /** * To protect user privacy, read receipts for private chats are * only stored for pm_read_date_expire_period * seconds after the message was sent. (integer) */

groupcall_video_participants_max.description:
/**
 * Maximum number of participants in a group call (livestreams
 * allow âˆž participants) (integer)
 */

reactions_uniq_max.description: /** * Maximum number of unique reactions for any given message: * for example, if there are 2000 and 1000 custom emoji reactions and * reactions_uniq_max = 2, you can't add a reaction, because that would raise the * number of unique reactions to 3 > 2. (integer) */

reactions_in_chat_max.description:
/**
 * Maximum number of reactions that can be marked as allowed in
 * a chat using {@link RawChatReactionsSome}. (integer)
 */

reactions_user_max_default.description:
/**
 * Maximum number of reactions that can be added to a single
 * message by a non-Premium user. (integer)
 */

reactions_user_max_premium.description:
/**
 * Maximum number of reactions that can be added to a single
 * message by a Premium user. (integer)
 */

default_emoji_statuses_stickerset_id.description:
/**
 * Default emoji status stickerset ID. (integer)
 * 
 * 
 * Note that the stickerset can be fetched using
 * {@link RawInputStickerSetEmojiDefaultStatuses}. 
 */

ringtone_duration_max.description: /** * The maximum duration in seconds of * uploadable * notification sounds Â» (integer) */

ringtone_size_max.description: /** * The maximum post-conversion size in bytes of * uploadable * notification sounds Â» */

ringtone_saved_count_max.description: /** * The maximum number of * saveable * notification sounds Â» */

message_animated_emoji_max.description: /** * The maximum number of * custom * emojis that may be present in a message. (integer) */

stickers_premium_by_emoji_num.description: /** * Defines how many * Premium * stickers to show in the sticker suggestion popup when * entering an emoji into the text field, see the * sticker * docs for more info (integer, defaults to 0) */

stickers_normal_by_emoji_per_premium_num.description: /** * For * Premium * users, used to define the suggested sticker list, see * the * sticker * docs for more info (integer, defaults to 2) */

premium_purchase_blocked.description: /** * The user can't purchase * Telegram * Premium. The app must also hide all Premium features, * including stars for other users, et cetera. (boolean) */

channels_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum number of * channels * and supergroups a * non-Premium * user may join (integer) */

channels_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of * channels * and supergroups a * Premium * user may join (integer) */

saved_gifs_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum number of GIFs a * non-Premium * user may save (integer) */

saved_gifs_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of GIFs a * Premium * user may save (integer) */

stickers_faved_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum number of stickers a * non-Premium * user may * add * to Favorites Â» (integer) */

stickers_faved_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of stickers a * Premium * user may * add * to Favorites Â» (integer) */

dialog_filters_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum number of * folders * a * non-Premium * user may create (integer) */

dialog_filters_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of * folders * a * Premium * user may create (integer) */

dialog_filters_chats_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum number of chats a * non-Premium * user may add to a * folder * (integer) */

dialog_filters_chats_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of chats a * Premium * user may add to a * folder * (integer) */

dialogs_pinned_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum number of chats a * non-Premium * user may pin (integer) */

dialogs_pinned_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of chats a * Premium * user may pin (integer) */

dialogs_folder_pinned_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum number of chats a * non-Premium * user may pin in a folder (integer) */

dialogs_folder_pinned_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of chats a * Premium * user may pin in a folder (integer) */

channels_public_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum number of public * channels * or supergroups a * non-Premium * user may create (integer) */

channels_public_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of public * channels * or supergroups a * Premium * user may create (integer) */

caption_length_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum UTF-8 length of media captions sendable by * non-Premium * users (integer) */

caption_length_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum UTF-8 length of media captions sendable by * Premium * users (integer) */

upload_max_fileparts_default.description: /** * The maximum number of file parts uploadable by * non-Premium * users (integer, the maximum file size can be extrapolated by * multiplying this value by 524288, the biggest * possible chunk size) */

upload_max_fileparts_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of file parts uploadable by * Premium * users (integer, the maximum file size can be extrapolated by * multiplying this value by 524288, the biggest * possible chunk size) */

about_length_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum UTF-8 length of bios of * non-Premium * users (integer) */

about_length_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum UTF-8 length of bios of * Premium * users (integer) */

premium_promo_order.description: /** * Array of string identifiers, indicating the order of * Telegram * Premium features in the Telegram Premium promotion * popup, * see * here for the possible values Â» */

premium_bot_username.description: /** * Contains the username of the official * Telegram * Premium bot that may be used to buy a * Telegram * Premium subscription, see * here for * detailed instructions Â» (string) */

premium_invoice_slug.description: /** * Contains an * invoice * slug that may be used to buy a * Telegram * Premium subscription, see * here for * detailed instructions Â» (string) */

premium_gift_attach_menu_icon.description: /** * Whether a gift icon should be shown in the attachment menu * in private chats with users, offering the current user to * gift a * Telegram * Premium subscription to the other user in the chat. * (boolean) */

premium_gift_text_field_icon.description: /** * Whether a gift icon should be shown in the text bar in * private chats with users (ie like the / icon in * chats with bots), offering the current user to gift a * Telegram * Premium subscription to the other user in the chat. Can * only be true if premium_gift_attach_menu_icon * is also true. (boolean) */

chatlist_update_period.description: /** * Users that import a folder using a * chat * folder deep link Â» should retrieve additions made to the * folder by invoking * {@link chatlists.RawGetChatlistUpdatesRequest} at most every * chatlist_update_period seconds. (integer) */

chatlist_invites_limit_default.description: /** * Maximum number of per-folder * chat * folder deep links Â» that can be created by * non-Premium * users. (integer) */

chatlist_invites_limit_premium.description: /** * Maximum number of per-folder * chat * folder deep links Â» that can be created by * Premium * users. (integer) */

chatlists_joined_limit_default.description: /** * Maximum number of * shareable * folders * non-Premium * users may have. (integer) */

chatlists_joined_limit_premium.description: /** * Maximum number of * shareable * folders * Premium * users may have. (integer) */

small_queue_max_active_operations_count.description:
/**
 * A soft limit, specifying the maximum number of files that
 * should be downloaded in parallel from the same DC, for files
 * smaller than 20MB. (integer)
 */

large_queue_max_active_operations_count.description:
/**
 * A soft limit, specifying the maximum number of files that
 * should be downloaded in parallel from the same DC, for files
 * bigger than 20MB. (integer)
 */

authorization_autoconfirm_period.description: /** * An * unconfirmed * session Â» will be autoconfirmed this many seconds after * login. (integer) */

story_viewers_expire_period.description: /** * The exact list of users that viewed the story will be hidden * from the poster this many seconds after the story expires. * (integer)This limit applies only to * non-Premium * users, * Premium * users can always access the viewer list. */

story_expiring_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum number of active * stories * for * non-Premium * users (integer). */

story_expiring_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of active * stories * for * Premium * users (integer). */

story_caption_length_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum UTF-8 length of story captions for * Premium * users. (integer) */

story_caption_length_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum UTF-8 length of story captions for * non-Premium * users. (integer) */

stories_posting.description:
/** * Indicates whether users can post stories. (string)One of: *
  • enabled - Any user can post stories.
    • *
  • premium - Only users with a * Premium * subscription can post stories.
    • *
  • disabled - Users can't post stories.
    • * */

stories_stealth_past_period.description: /** * Enabling * stories * stealth mode with the past flag will erase * views of any story opened in the past * stories_stealth_past_period seconds. (integer) */

stories_stealth_future_period.description: /** * Enabling * stories * stealth mode with the future flag will hide * views of any story opened in the next * stories_stealth_future_period seconds. * (integer) */

stories_stealth_cooldown_period.description: /** * After enabling * stories * stealth mode, this many seconds must elapse before the * user is allowed to enable it again. (integer) */

stories_sent_weekly_limit_default.description: /** * Maximum number of stories that can be sent in a week by * non-Premium * users. (integer) */

stories_sent_weekly_limit_premium.description: /** * Maximum number of stories that can be sent in a week by * Premium * users. (integer) */

stories_sent_monthly_limit_default.description: /** * Maximum number of stories that can be sent in a month by * non-Premium * users. (integer) */

stories_sent_monthly_limit_premium.description: /** * Maximum number of stories that can be sent in a month by * Premium * users. (integer) */

stories_suggested_reactions_limit_defaul.description: /** * Maximum number of * story * reaction media areas Â» that can be added to a story by * non-Premium * users. (integer) */

stories_suggested_reactions_limit_premiu.description: /** * Maximum number of * story * reaction media areas Â» that can be added to a story by * Premium * users. (integer) */

stories_venue_search_username.description: /** * Username of the inline bot to use to generate venue location * tags for stories, see * here * Â» for more info. (string) */

stories_changelog_user_id.description: /** * ID of the official Telegram user that will post stories * about new Telegram features: stories posted by this user * should be shown on the * active * or active and hidden stories bar just like for contacts, * even if the user was removed from the contact list. * (integer, defaults to 777000) */

stories_entities.description: /** * Whether * styled * text entities and links in story text captions can be * used by all users (enabled), only * [Premium](/api/premium users) (premium), or no * one (disabled). (string)This field is used both * when posting stories, to indicate to the user whether they * can use entities, and when viewing stories, to hide entities * (client-side) on stories posted by users whose * Premium * subscription has expired (if stories_entities == * "premium" and {@link RawUser}.premium is * not set, or if stories_entities == "disabled"). * */

giveaway_gifts_purchase_available.description: /** * Whether * giveaways * can be started by the current user. (boolean) */

giveaway_add_peers_max.description: /** * The maximum number of users that can be specified when * making a * direct * giveaway. (integer) */

giveaway_countries_max.description: /** * The maximum number of countries that can be specified when * restricting the set of participating countries in a * giveaway. * (itneger) */

giveaway_boosts_per_premium.description: /** * The number of * boosts * that will be gained by a channel for each winner of a * giveaway. * (integer) */

giveaway_period_max.description: /** * The maximum duration in seconds of a * giveaway. * (integer) */

boosts_per_sent_gift.description: /** * The number of additional * boost * slots that the current user will receive when * gifting * a Telegram Premium subscription. */

transcribe_audio_trial_weekly_number.description: /** * The maximum number of * speech * recognition Â» calls per week for * non-Premium * users. (integer) */

transcribe_audio_trial_duration_max.description: /** * The maximum allowed duration of media in seconds for * speech * recognition Â» for * non-Premium * users. (integer) */

recommended_channels_limit_default.description: /** * The maximum number of similar channels that can be * recommended by * {@link channels.RawGetChannelRecommendationsRequest} to * non-Premium * users. (integer) */

recommended_channels_limit_premium.description: /** * The maximum number of similar channels that can be * recommended by * {@link channels.RawGetChannelRecommendationsRequest} to * Premium * users. (integer) */

channel_bg_icon_level_min.description: /** * After reaching at least this * boost * level Â», channels gain the ability to change their * message * accent palette emoji Â». (integer) */

channel_profile_bg_icon_level_min.description: /** * After reaching at least this * boost * level Â», channels gain the ability to change their * profile * accent palette emoji Â». (integer) */

channel_emoji_status_level_min.description: /** * After reaching at least this * boost * level Â», channels gain the ability to change their * status * emoji Â». (integer) */

channel_wallpaper_level_min.description: /** * After reaching at least this * boost * level Â», channels gain the ability to set a * fill * channel wallpaper, see here Â» for more info. (integer) */

channel_custom_wallpaper_level_min.description: /** * After reaching at least this * boost * level Â», channels gain the ability to set any custom * wallpaper, * not just * fill * channel wallpapers, see here Â» for more info. (integer) */

saved_dialogs_pinned_limit_default.description: /** * Maximum number of pinned dialogs in * saved * messages for * non-Premium * users. (integer) */

saved_dialogs_pinned_limit_premium.description: /** * Maximum number of pinned dialogs in * saved * messages for * Premium * users. (integer) */
